item.title: ISS 建议 Frontier 股东对 Verizon 的收购要约投弃权票
item.description: 著名代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）周五建议前沿通信公司股东对 Verizon 200 亿美元的收购要约投弃权票，转而支持休会提案。【原文：Prominent proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services on Friday recommended Frontier Communications shareholders abstain from voting on Verizon's $20 billion takeover bid and instead support the adjournment proposal.】

item.title: 波音首席执行官：飞机制造商是时候 "集中精力重建业务
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周五敦促3.3万名罢工工人投票接受一份为期四年的新合同，其中包括加薪38%，从而结束为期七周的停工。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg urged 33,000 striking workers on Friday to vote to accept a new four-year contract deal that includes a 38% pay hike that would end a seven-week work stoppage.】

item.title: 华尔街将密切关注大选之夜的美国县市
item.description: 随着共和党人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和民主党人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在白宫竞选中势均力敌，政治预测人士将密切关注全国各地的一些郡县，以便在周二晚间投票结束后找到谁更占优势的线索。【原文：With Republican Donald Trump and Democrat Kamala Harris locked in a dead heat in the race for the White House, political forecasters will be eyeing a clutch of counties across the country for clues on who has the edge once polls start to close on Tuesday evening.】

item.title: Capital One 警告称 CFPB 可能对其储蓄账户采取执法行动
item.description: Capital One 消费贷款公司在周四晚些时候提交的一份文件中披露，一家顶级联邦机构可能会对 Capital One 采取执法行动，指控该公司在储蓄账户方面存在虚假陈述。【原文：A top federal agency may pursue enforcement action against Capital One over alleged misrepresentations related to its savings accounts, the consumer lender disclosed in a filing late on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国因 GlobalFoundries 向中国公司运送芯片而对其进行处罚
item.description: 美国商务部周五表示，美国已对 GlobalFoundries 公司处以 50 万美元的减轻处罚，原因是该公司未经授权向一家中国公司运送芯片。【原文：The United States has imposed a $500,000 mitigated penalty against GlobalFoundries for shipping chips to a Chinese company without seeking authorization, the Department of Commerce said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道华特迪士尼成立业务部门，协调人工智能和增强现实技术的应用
item.description: 华特迪士尼正在组建一个新部门，以协调公司对人工智能和混合现实等新兴技术的使用，这家媒体巨头正在探索其电影、电视和主题公园部门的应用。【原文：Walt Disney is forming a new unit to coordinate the company's use of emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and mixed reality, as the media giant explores applications across its film, television and theme park divisions.】

item.title: 主要航空公司批评拜登的航空竞争审查，要求给予更多时间
item.description: 代表主要航空公司的团体周五批评拜登政府对航空旅行竞争状况进行的广泛公开调查，称该调查可能会对美国航空业的未来产生巨大影响。【原文：Groups representing major airlines on Friday criticized the Biden administration's broad public inquiry into the state of competition in air travel, saying the review could dramatically impact the future of U.S. aviation.】

item.title: 加密货币 ETF 在美国大选前迎来大量资金流入，交易员为波动性做好准备
item.description: 数据显示，投资者已将资金投入追踪比特币的基金，押注共和党人唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，即使他们预计世界上最大的加密货币的价格将在选举周期间剧烈波动。【原文：Investors have plowed money into funds tracking bitcoin, betting on a return of Republican Donald Trump to the White House even as they expect wild price swings in the world's largest cryptocurrency during the election week, data showed.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油出口因产量增加和对美国、印度的销售而创下 4 年来的新高
item.description: 根据委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）提供的航运数据和文件，受原油产量增长以及对印度和美国销售量增加的推动，委内瑞拉的石油出口量在 10 月份上升到四年来的最高点，接近每天 95 万桶。【原文：Venezuela's oil exports rose to a four-year high, approaching 950,000 barrels per day in October, boosted by growing crude output and more sales to India and the United States, according to shipping data and documents from state firm PDVSA.】

item.title: 近期数据维持美联储利率软着陆观点不变
item.description: 数据密集的一周使美国联邦储备委员会的核心观点保持不变，即在经济持续增长的情况下，物价压力继续缓解，就业市场继续弯曲但没有破裂。【原文：A data-heavy week has kept the U.S. Federal Reserve's core view intact of an economy where price pressures continue to ease and the job market continues to bend but not break amid ongoing economic growth.】

item.title: 苹果将向 Globalstar 投资高达 15 亿美元以扩大卫星覆盖范围
item.description: 苹果公司在周五提交的一份监管文件中表示，将向 Globalstar 投资最多 15 亿美元，以资助其扩大 iPhone 通信服务。【原文：Apple will invest up to $1.5 billion in Globalstar to fund the expansion of its iPhone communication services, the satellite provider said in a regulatory filing on Friday.】

item.title: 通胀前景放缓，阿根廷下调利率
item.description: 阿根廷央行周五出人意料地将基准利率下调了 500 个基点，降至 35%，这表明人们对央行能够抑制该国三位数的通货膨胀率越来越感到乐观。【原文：Argentina's central bank cut its benchmark interest rate by 500 basis points to 35% on Friday in a surprise move, signaling growing optimism that it can tame the country's triple-digit inflation.】

item.title: 资产管理公司 Vanguard 在预算驱动的抛售后买入金边债券
item.description: 全球第二大资产管理公司先锋（Vanguard）周五表示，在工党新政府公布预算后，该公司利用英国国债价格大幅下跌的机会买入了英国国债。【原文：The world's second-biggest asset manager Vanguard said on Friday it had bought UK government bonds in the wake of the new Labour government's budget, taking advantage of a sharp fall in prices.】

item.title: 百事公司击败纽约州就塑料污染提起的 "掠夺性 "诉讼
item.description: 纽约州指控百事可乐饮料和零食公司使用一次性塑料包装污染环境，法官批评该州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯（Letitia James）提起诉讼，百事可乐公司胜诉被驳回。【原文：PepsiCo won the dismissal of New York's lawsuit accusing the beverage and snack-food company of polluting the environment with single-use plastic packaging, as the judge criticized the state's attorney general, Letitia James, for bringing the case.】

item.title: 哈里斯与特朗普白宫竞选进入最后阶段，股票值得关注
item.description: 就在 11 月 5 日美国总统大选前几天，投资者正试图判断股市将如何反应，因为民调和博彩平台都显示副总统卡马拉-哈里斯和前总统唐纳德-特朗普之间的竞争将十分激烈。【原文：Just days ahead of the Nov. 5 presidential election in the U.S., investors are trying to gauge how stock markets will react as polls and betting platforms point to a tight race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 石油产量创历史新高，埃克森、雪佛龙第三季度利润超预期
item.description: 美国石油生产商埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）和雪佛龙（Chevron）周五公布的第三季度利润好于预期，表现优于欧洲竞争对手，原因是创纪录的高石油产量缓解了燃料利润率骤降带来的打击。【原文：U.S. oil producers Exxon Mobil and Chevron posted better-than-expected third-quarter profits on Friday, outperforming their European rivals, as record high oil production cushioned the blow from a plunge in fuel margins.】

item.title: 美国 10 月制造业降至 15 个月低点
item.description: 10 月份，美国制造业活动下滑至 15 个月以来的最低点，工厂面临着投入品价格上涨的问题。【原文：U.S. manufacturing activity slumped to a 15-month low in October and factories faced higher prices for inputs.】

item.title: 就业数据疲软，美联储被认为有望降息
item.description: 失业率保持不变表明劳动力市场依然强劲。【原文：An unchanged unemployment rate indicated that the labor market remains strong.】

item.title: 美国 10 月就业人数增长乏力受风暴和罢工影响
item.description: 受飓风和航空航天工厂工人罢工的影响，10月份美国就业增长大幅放缓，但失业率仍稳定在4.1%的水平，这为劳动力市场在周二大选前保持稳定提供了保证。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed sharply in October amid disruptions from hurricanes and strikes by aerospace factory workers, but the unemployment rate held steady at 4.1%, offering assurance that the labor market remained on solid footing ahead of Tuesday's election.】

item.title: 西蒙地产集团季度运营资金未达预期
item.description: 受综合购物中心租赁需求疲软的影响，商业地产投资信托公司西蒙地产集团（Simon Property Group）周五公布的第三季度运营资金（FFO）未能达到市场预期。【原文：Commercial real estate investment trust Simon Property Group missed market expectations for third-quarter funds from operations (FFO) on Friday, hurt by softer leasing demand at its mixed-use shopping centers.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份就业增长大幅放缓；失业率维持在 4.1%不变
item.description: 受飓风和航空航天工厂工人罢工的影响，10月份美国就业增长大幅放缓，但失业率仍稳定在4.1%的水平，这为劳动力市场在周二大选前保持稳定提供了保证。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed sharply in October amid disruptions from hurricanes and strikes by aerospace factory workers, but the unemployment rate held steady at 4.1%, offering assurance that the labor market remained on solid footing ahead of Tuesday's election.】

item.title: 成本下降、需求稳定，多米尼克能源公司第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周五，多米尼克能源公司（Dominion Energy）第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是该电力公司受益于较低的成本和炎热天气期间稳定的电力需求。【原文：Dominion Energy beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Friday, as the electric utilities company benefited from lower costs and steady electricity demand during hot weather.】

item.title: T Rowe Price咨询费增加，季度利润飙升
item.description: 周五，资产管理公司 T Rowe Price 公布第三季度利润增长 17.4%，主要得益于美国股市走强推动了公司管理资产规模（AUM）的增长，咨询费也随之飙升。【原文：Asset manager T Rowe Price reported a 17.4% rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, helped by a jump in advisory fees as strength in U.S. equities boosted assets under management (AUM) at the firm.】

item.title: 汇丰银行、巴克莱银行和斯坦查特银行争夺美国银行业财富，不受白宫竞选影响
item.description: 随着美国企业为国际扩张计划寻求专业人才，英国大型全球性贷款机构汇丰银行、巴克莱银行和渣打银行正争相进入美国商业银行的蓬勃发展阶段。【原文：Britain's big global lenders HSBC , Barclays and Standard Chartered are vying to tap into a boom in U.S. commercial banking as corporate America seeks expertise for international expansion plans.】

item.title: 对冲活动强劲，Cboe 季度利润上升
item.description: Cboe Global Markets 周五公布，由于投资者积极对冲地缘政治和经济不确定性，期权交易强劲，第三季度利润上升。【原文：Cboe Global Markets reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, driven by strong options trading as investors actively hedged against geopolitical and economic uncertainties.】

item.title: 波音公司提出新的工资方案以结束罢工，波音股价上涨
item.description: 周五收盘前，波音公司上涨了 2%，因为这家美国飞机制造商提高了对约 33,000 名罢工工人的加薪提议，这是该公司在此前两次合同提议遭到员工拒绝后，为结束破坏性罢工所做的最新努力。【原文：Boeing rose 2% before the bell on Friday after the U.S. planemaker bumped its wage hike offer to about 33,000 striking workers, its latest effort to end a damaging strike after two earlier contract offers were rebuffed by employees.】

item.title: 雅培在早产儿配方奶粉试验中首战告捷后股价上涨
item.description: 周五收盘前，雅培制药公司股价上涨近 5%，此前陪审团认定该公司和 Reckitt 旗下的一家公司在早产儿配方奶粉风险诉讼案中没有责任。【原文：Abbott Laboratories shares rose nearly 5% before the bell on Friday, after a jury cleared the company and a Reckitt unit of liability in a lawsuit over their premature baby formulas' risks.】

item.title: 石油需求稳定，管道运营商恩桥公司第三季度利润增长一倍多
item.description: 周五，Enbridge 公布其第三季度利润增长了两倍多，原因是这家加拿大管道运营商受益于稳定的石油需求。【原文：Enbridge posted a more than twofold jump in its third-quarter profit on Friday, as the Canadian pipeline operator benefited from steady oil demand.】

item.title: 埃克森86亿美元利润超预期，销量抵消价格疲软影响
item.description: 埃克森美孚周五公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于其首个完整季度强劲的石油产量，其中包括美国页岩油生产商先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）的石油产量。【原文：Exxon Mobil on Friday beat Wall Street's third quarter profit estimate, boosted by strong oil output in its first full quarter that includes volumes from U.S. shale producer Pioneer Natural Resources.】

item.title: 亚马逊安抚马匹，薪资即将公布
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】
